overview: Amir Khan is the guy who conceived and developed the idea of one of the most popular Facebook south Asian apps named Baba Fooka. http://apps.facebook.com/babafooka Besides this he also conceived the idea of http://Etsycouponcode.com . A platform where Etsy sellers can submit their coupons and buyers can search for coupons. Currently he’s working at PureLogics as Project Manager. He was interviewed by Second biggest channel of Pakistan Express TV : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YhkWSCjP7Iw
